tt0103874.name: Dracula
tt0103874.synopsis: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.
tt0103874.actors: Gary Oldman, Winona Ryder, Anthony Hopkins, Keanu Reeves

tt5034838.name: Godzilla vs. Kong
tt5034838.synopsis: The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance.
tt5034838.actors: Alexander Skarsgård, Millie Bobby Brown, Rebecca Hall, Brian Tyree Henry

tt2222042.name: Love and Monsters
tt2222042.synopsis: Seven years after he survived the monster apocalypse, lovably hapless Joel leaves his cozy underground bunker behind on a quest to reunite with his ex.
tt2222042.actors: Dylan O'Brien, Jessica Henwick, Michael Rooker, Dan Ewing

tt4154796.name: Avengers: Endgame
tt4154796.synopsis: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
tt4154796.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth

tt4682266.name: The New Mutants
tt4682266.synopsis: Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.
tt4682266.actors: Maisie Williams, Anya Taylor-Joy, Charlie Heaton, Alice Braga

tt0120737.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
tt0120737.synopsis: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
tt0120737.actors: Alan Howard, Noel Appleby, Sean Astin, Sala Baker

tt0093773.name: Predator
tt0093773.synopsis: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.
tt0093773.actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Carl Weathers, Elpidia Carrillo, Bill Duke

tt0078748.name: Alien
tt0078748.synopsis: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.
tt0078748.actors: Tom Skerritt, Sigourney Weaver, Veronica Cartwright, Harry Dean Stanton

tt9820556.name: Breach
tt9820556.synopsis: On the cusp of fatherhood, a junior mechanic aboard an interstellar ark to New Earth must outwit a malevolent cosmic terror intent on using the spaceship as a weapon.
tt9820556.actors: Cody Kearsley, Bruce Willis, Rachel Nichols, Kassandra Clementi

tt1396484.name: It
tt1396484.synopsis: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.
tt1396484.actors: Jaeden Martell, Jeremy Ray Taylor, Sophia Lillis, Finn Wolfhard
